pullRequest.title: README: Dependency badge
pullRequest.bodyText: The service we use to show the dependency status in the README is having trouble recently (e.g. alanshaw/david#173, alanshaw/david#171, alanshaw/david-www#435, alanshaw/david-www#357). Therefore, we are switching the badge to libraries.io for now.

nodes.diffHunk:
